articles.title: Star Wars Creator George Lucas Reveals His Stance On Disney's Internal War - CBR - Comic Book Resources
articles.description: George Lucas weighs in on the internal investor battle at Disney.
articles.content:
Star Wars and Indiana Jones creator George Lucas backs CEO Bob Iger in Disney's investor battle.
In the ongoing investor battle between The Walt Disney Company and investor Nelson Peltz, legendary f… [+2725 chars]
